name: Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love
name_original: Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love
description:
Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love is an adventure-strategy game developed by Idea Factory and Red Entertainment. It was originally released in 2010. NIS America published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love is available on PlayStation 2.
